english.segment1: we got that smooth reggae style. we got that smooth reggae style. brothers and sisters ladies and gentlemen. can we all get along everyone let's be friends. if you're in the crowd then get down and grab a hand. raise em to the sky and look up to heaven. the rain falls from the sky. the sun shines on you and i. the world spins round and round. still we're here with two feet on the ground. we got that smooth reggae style. we got that we got that reggae style.
